newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: National Forge wins A$25 mln order.
newsitem.headline: National Forge wins A$25 mln order.

text.p: National Forge Ltd said on Friday it had won an order worth more than A$25 million over four years to supply motor vehicle suspension components.
It said delivery of production quantities "for an Australian-made motor vehicle" was expected to begin in May 1998.
"This order will complete the company's repositioning within the automotive sector," National Forge said.
The company said development of the golf driver market would continue to be its prime focus.

"It is anticipated that major orders will be forthcoming for the 1997/98 (June 30) financial year and the company is well underway to achieving its monthly target of 50,000 golf heads by the end of calendar year 1997."
